entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this morning. Showers beginning early this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Local amount 5 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 8. POP 30%
